body_html:
after import torch, can you add torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = True. I suspect Windows is selecting a different CuDNN algorithm than Ubuntu for convolutions.
Also, can you check that print(torch.backends.cudnn.enabled) prints True
body_text:
after import torch, can you add torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = True. I suspect Windows is selecting a different CuDNN algorithm than Ubuntu for convolutions.
Also, can you check that print(torch.backends.cudnn.enabled) prints True
body:
after `import torch`, can you add `torch.backends.cudnn.benchmark = True`. I suspect Windows is selecting a different CuDNN algorithm than Ubuntu for convolutions.
Also, can you check that `print(torch.backends.cudnn.enabled)` prints True
